content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":260692,"originalJapaneseLine":"数個のイベントにしても良い","translatedEnglishLine":"It might be good to make it a few events."},{"lineNumber":260693,"originalJapaneseLine":"休憩、おやつ","translatedEnglishLine":"Break, snack."},{"lineNumber":260694,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は地下洞窟を進んで工場の真下あたりにした","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others advanced through the underground cave and reached just beneath the factory."},{"lineNumber":260695,"originalJapaneseLine":"　入れる場所から工場の真下へはぐるっと迂回の必要があったので","translatedEnglishLine":"Since it was necessary to make a large detour to get directly under the factory from the accessible point,"},{"lineNumber":260696,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここに来まで時間がかかった","translatedEnglishLine":"it took some time to reach here."},{"lineNumber":260697,"originalJapaneseLine":"[２４０／２１／マリアとダークランス]でマリアが位置場所です","translatedEnglishLine":"In [240/21/Maria and Dark Lance], Maria's location is shown."},{"lineNumber":260698,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアはいません、痕跡があります","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria is not here, but there are traces of her."},{"lineNumber":260699,"originalJapaneseLine":"あのバカ、遭難したらその場所から動かないのが常識なのに","translatedEnglishLine":"That idiot — the common sense is to not move from that spot if lost."},{"lineNumber":260700,"originalJapaneseLine":"ストーンガーディアンが発生した後があるわ、きっと、これに襲われて・・","translatedEnglishLine":"There are signs that Stone Guardians appeared here; surely, she was attacked by them..."},{"lineNumber":260701,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむむむ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmmmmm."},{"lineNumber":260702,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスに保護されて地下迷宮を進んでいるマリス","translatedEnglishLine":"Maris is being protected by Dark Lance and progressing through the underground labyrinth."},{"lineNumber":260703,"originalJapaneseLine":"遠くからランスがマリアを呼ぶ声、ランス達が近くにいると分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"From afar, Lance's voice calling Maria is heard; it's understood that Lance and the others are nearby."},{"lineNumber":260704,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスは、ここまでだ、俺はあいつとはまだ決着を付ける時ではない","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance says, ‘This is as far as I go; it's not yet time for me to settle things with that guy.’"},{"lineNumber":260705,"originalJapaneseLine":"さぁ、あいつの元へおねーさんは戻りなさいとマリアを押す","translatedEnglishLine":"He pushes Maria, saying, ‘Now, sister, you should return to him.’"},{"lineNumber":260706,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、それから俺がおねーさんを助けた事は言わないで欲しい、あいつに貸しを作りたくない","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, also, I want you not to tell him that I saved you—I don't want to owe him any favors."},{"lineNumber":260707,"originalJapaneseLine":"これだけは守って欲しい","translatedEnglishLine":"Please keep this just this one thing."},{"lineNumber":260708,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260709,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアが見つかった、ランスがほっとする。","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria is found, and Lance feels relieved."},{"lineNumber":260710,"originalJapaneseLine":"無事でよかったと、他の仲間も言う","translatedEnglishLine":"The other companions also say they're glad she's safe."},{"lineNumber":260711,"originalJapaneseLine":"工場に戻る","translatedEnglishLine":"They return to the factory."},{"lineNumber":260712,"originalJapaneseLine":"チューリップ３号の整備をして動くようにしてから、１２台とも引き連れて脱出した","translatedEnglishLine":"After repairing Tulip No. 3 to make it operational, they led all twelve units and escaped."},{"lineNumber":260713,"originalJapaneseLine":"その際、マリアが","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, Maria said,"},{"lineNumber":260714,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっさっきの敵のロボット、倒したんだよね、破片破片、全部もってかえるー","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, we defeated the enemy robot from earlier, right? I'll take all the fragments back with me~"},{"lineNumber":260715,"originalJapaneseLine":"（マリアはダークランスの事が少しひっかかっているが、それを考えないようにする為にも","translatedEnglishLine":"(Maria is a little concerned about Dark Lance, but to avoid thinking about it,"},{"lineNumber":260716,"originalJapaneseLine":"　前向きにメカにむかっていた）","translatedEnglishLine":"she was positively focusing on the machines.)"},{"lineNumber":260717,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択肢　ジフテリアへ向かうを選ぶ","translatedEnglishLine":"Choice: Select ‘Head toward Jiphtheria’."},{"lineNumber":260718,"originalJapaneseLine":"船がみたいからそっちに向かう","translatedEnglishLine":"Because I want to see the ship, I head there."},{"lineNumber":260719,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアは別行動となる、大丈夫ですよ、魔軍の勢力範囲ですがカスタム自体は","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria goes separate; it's okay, although it's within the demon army's territory, the custom machine itself is not..."},{"lineNumber":260720,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍に占領されている訳じゃないでからと","translatedEnglishLine":"occupied by the demon army."},{"lineNumber":260721,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはジフテリアに向かう、そこにナギが現れる、一緒にいきたい船みたい","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance heads toward Jiphtheria, where Nagi appears and seems to want to go together to see the ship."},{"lineNumber":260722,"originalJapaneseLine":"志津香もしかなく同行する","translatedEnglishLine":"Shizuka reluctantly accompanies them."},{"lineNumber":260723,"originalJapaneseLine":"道中のイベント","translatedEnglishLine":"Events along the way."},{"lineNumber":260724,"originalJapaneseLine":"志津香とナギ","translatedEnglishLine":"Shizuka and Nagi."},{"lineNumber":260725,"originalJapaneseLine":"落ちた遺跡の場所が町になっている","translatedEnglishLine":"The site of fallen ruins has become a town."},{"lineNumber":260726,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＹＯＲＡ他、闘神面子を出す？","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall we include YORA and other Fighting God members?"},{"lineNumber":260727,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと前に発掘されたマナバッテリーとかも売っていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Mana batteries recently excavated were also being sold."},{"lineNumber":260728,"originalJapaneseLine":"買ったのはコパンドン、ランス城にこっそり設置している物","translatedEnglishLine":"The ones bought were Copandon, secretly installed in Lance's castle."},{"lineNumber":260729,"originalJapaneseLine":"ピッテン関係の何かイベント","translatedEnglishLine":"Some event related to Pitten."},{"lineNumber":260730,"originalJapaneseLine":"かえるにょメンバー出す？","translatedEnglishLine":"Shall we include the Kaerunyo members?"},{"lineNumber":260731,"originalJapaneseLine":"火星の国の話","translatedEnglishLine":"The story of the country on Mars."},{"lineNumber":260732,"originalJapaneseLine":"無しでもいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe it's okay without it."},{"lineNumber":260733,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、マリアの様子","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Maria's situation."},{"lineNumber":260734,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カスタムに付く、魔軍が居て少し混乱","translatedEnglishLine":"She reaches the custom base, finds the demon army there, causing some confusion."},{"lineNumber":260735,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな中、ダークランスと出会った","translatedEnglishLine":"Amidst that, she encounters Dark Lance."},{"lineNumber":260736,"originalJapaneseLine":"　内容はカスタムルートと似たような物のダイジェスト版","translatedEnglishLine":"The content is a digest version similar to the custom route."},{"lineNumber":260737,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パイアールは出てきません","translatedEnglishLine":"Paiar does not appear."},{"lineNumber":260738,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無事にチューリップ３号Ｈ型１２台を引き連れてカスタムを出ます","translatedEnglishLine":"She safely leaves the custom base leading twelve H-type Tulip No. 3 units."},{"lineNumber":260739,"originalJapaneseLine":"街道を移動中","translatedEnglishLine":"Moving along the highway."},{"lineNumber":260740,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんらかの理由でパイアールと遭遇","translatedEnglishLine":"For some reason, they encounter Paiar."},{"lineNumber":260741,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＰＤ部隊との戦闘になる","translatedEnglishLine":"A battle with the PD unit ensues."},{"lineNumber":260742,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＰＤはなんとか撃退したが、","translatedEnglishLine":"They somehow repelled the PD,"},{"lineNumber":260743,"originalJapaneseLine":"パイアールはいつの間にかいなくなっていた","translatedEnglishLine":"but Paiar had disappeared before anyone noticed."},{"lineNumber":260744,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジフテリアに到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrival at Jiphtheria."},{"lineNumber":260745,"originalJapaneseLine":"規模　　★★　／七大自由都市国家の一つ","translatedEnglishLine":"Scale: ★★ / One of the Seven Great Free City-States."},{"lineNumber":260746,"originalJapaneseLine":"都市長　ビョンホウ（男、司祭も兼ねている）","translatedEnglishLine":"City Mayor: Byonhou (male, also serves as priest)."},{"lineNumber":260747,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＡＬ教と関係が深い半宗教国家","translatedEnglishLine":"A semi-religious state with close ties to the AL religion."},{"lineNumber":260748,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260749,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーが説明してもいいかも、ＡＬ教と関係が深い","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurukku might explain that it has deep connections with the AL religion."},{"lineNumber":260750,"originalJapaneseLine":"川中島のカイズとの連絡が密で、カイズに渡る者が必ず通る","translatedEnglishLine":"They maintain close contact with Kaizu in the Kawanakajima region, and anyone crossing to Kaizu must pass through here."},{"lineNumber":260751,"originalJapaneseLine":"また少しでもＡＬ教聖地の近で済みたい信者が多く住んでいる","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, many believers wishing to live as close as possible to the AL religion's sacred sites reside here."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数個のイベントにしても良い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might be good to make it a few events.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩、おやつ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Break, snack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は地下洞窟を進んで工場の真下あたりにした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others advanced through the underground cave and reached just beneath the factory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入れる場所から工場の真下へはぐるっと迂回の必要があったので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it was necessary to make a large detour to get directly under the factory from the accessible point,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに来まで時間がかかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it took some time to reach here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: [２４０／２１／マリアとダークランス]でマリアが位置場所です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In [240/21/Maria and Dark Lance], Maria's location is shown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアはいません、痕跡があります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria is not here, but there are traces of her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのバカ、遭難したらその場所から動かないのが常識なのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That idiot — the common sense is to not move from that spot if lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストーンガーディアンが発生した後があるわ、きっと、これに襲われて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are signs that Stone Guardians appeared here; surely, she was attacked by them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむむむ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmmmmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスに保護されて地下迷宮を進んでいるマリス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maris is being protected by Dark Lance and progressing through the underground labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠くからランスがマリアを呼ぶ声、ランス達が近くにいると分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From afar, Lance's voice calling Maria is heard; it's understood that Lance and the others are nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスは、ここまでだ、俺はあいつとはまだ決着を付ける時ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance says, ‘This is as far as I go; it's not yet time for me to settle things with that guy.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ、あいつの元へおねーさんは戻りなさいとマリアを押す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He pushes Maria, saying, ‘Now, sister, you should return to him.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、それから俺がおねーさんを助けた事は言わないで欲しい、あいつに貸しを作りたくない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, also, I want you not to tell him that I saved you—I don't want to owe him any favors.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これだけは守って欲しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please keep this just this one thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアが見つかった、ランスがほっとする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria is found, and Lance feels relieved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無事でよかったと、他の仲間も言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The other companions also say they're glad she's safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工場に戻る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They return to the factory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チューリップ３号の整備をして動くようにしてから、１２台とも引き連れて脱出した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After repairing Tulip No. 3 to make it operational, they led all twelve units and escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その際、マリアが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, Maria said,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっさっきの敵のロボット、倒したんだよね、破片破片、全部もってかえるー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, we defeated the enemy robot from earlier, right? I'll take all the fragments back with me~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （マリアはダークランスの事が少しひっかかっているが、それを考えないようにする為にも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Maria is a little concerned about Dark Lance, but to avoid thinking about it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前向きにメカにむかっていた）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she was positively focusing on the machines.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択肢　ジフテリアへ向かうを選ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Choice: Select ‘Head toward Jiphtheria’.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 船がみたいからそっちに向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I want to see the ship, I head there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアは別行動となる、大丈夫ですよ、魔軍の勢力範囲ですがカスタム自体は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria goes separate; it's okay, although it's within the demon army's territory, the custom machine itself is not...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に占領されている訳じゃないでからと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: occupied by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはジフテリアに向かう、そこにナギが現れる、一緒にいきたい船みたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance heads toward Jiphtheria, where Nagi appears and seems to want to go together to see the ship.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香もしかなく同行する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka reluctantly accompanies them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中のイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Events along the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香とナギ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka and Nagi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ちた遺跡の場所が町になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The site of fallen ruins has become a town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＹＯＲＡ他、闘神面子を出す？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we include YORA and other Fighting God members?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと前に発掘されたマナバッテリーとかも売っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mana batteries recently excavated were also being sold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 買ったのはコパンドン、ランス城にこっそり設置している物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ones bought were Copandon, secretly installed in Lance's castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピッテン関係の何かイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some event related to Pitten.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かえるにょメンバー出す？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we include the Kaerunyo members?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火星の国の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The story of the country on Mars.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無しでもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it's okay without it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、マリアの様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Maria's situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カスタムに付く、魔軍が居て少し混乱
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She reaches the custom base, finds the demon army there, causing some confusion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな中、ダークランスと出会った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amidst that, she encounters Dark Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内容はカスタムルートと似たような物のダイジェスト版
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content is a digest version similar to the custom route.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールは出てきません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Paiar does not appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無事にチューリップ３号Ｈ型１２台を引き連れてカスタムを出ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She safely leaves the custom base leading twelve H-type Tulip No. 3 units.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道を移動中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moving along the highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんらかの理由でパイアールと遭遇
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, they encounter Paiar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＰＤ部隊との戦闘になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle with the PD unit ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＰＤはなんとか撃退したが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They somehow repelled the PD,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールはいつの間にかいなくなっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Paiar had disappeared before anyone noticed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジフテリアに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrival at Jiphtheria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 規模　　★★　／七大自由都市国家の一つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scale: ★★ / One of the Seven Great Free City-States.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市長　ビョンホウ（男、司祭も兼ねている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: City Mayor: Byonhou (male, also serves as priest).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＡＬ教と関係が深い半宗教国家
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A semi-religious state with close ties to the AL religion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが説明してもいいかも、ＡＬ教と関係が深い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukku might explain that it has deep connections with the AL religion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 川中島のカイズとの連絡が密で、カイズに渡る者が必ず通る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They maintain close contact with Kaizu in the Kawanakajima region, and anyone crossing to Kaizu must pass through here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また少しでもＡＬ教聖地の近で済みたい信者が多く住んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, many believers wishing to live as close as possible to the AL religion's sacred sites reside here.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数個のイベントにしても良い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It might be good to make it a few events.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩、おやつ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Break, snack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は地下洞窟を進んで工場の真下あたりにした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others advanced through the underground cave and reached just beneath the factory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入れる場所から工場の真下へはぐるっと迂回の必要があったので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it was necessary to make a large detour to get directly under the factory from the accessible point,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに来まで時間がかかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it took some time to reach here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: [２４０／２１／マリアとダークランス]でマリアが位置場所です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In [240/21/Maria and Dark Lance], Maria's location is shown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアはいません、痕跡があります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria is not here, but there are traces of her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのバカ、遭難したらその場所から動かないのが常識なのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That idiot — the common sense is to not move from that spot if lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストーンガーディアンが発生した後があるわ、きっと、これに襲われて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are signs that Stone Guardians appeared here; surely, she was attacked by them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむむむ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmmmmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスに保護されて地下迷宮を進んでいるマリス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maris is being protected by Dark Lance and progressing through the underground labyrinth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠くからランスがマリアを呼ぶ声、ランス達が近くにいると分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From afar, Lance's voice calling Maria is heard; it's understood that Lance and the others are nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスは、ここまでだ、俺はあいつとはまだ決着を付ける時ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance says, ‘This is as far as I go; it's not yet time for me to settle things with that guy.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ、あいつの元へおねーさんは戻りなさいとマリアを押す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He pushes Maria, saying, ‘Now, sister, you should return to him.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、それから俺がおねーさんを助けた事は言わないで欲しい、あいつに貸しを作りたくない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, also, I want you not to tell him that I saved you—I don't want to owe him any favors.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これだけは守って欲しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please keep this just this one thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアが見つかった、ランスがほっとする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria is found, and Lance feels relieved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無事でよかったと、他の仲間も言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The other companions also say they're glad she's safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工場に戻る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They return to the factory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チューリップ３号の整備をして動くようにしてから、１２台とも引き連れて脱出した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After repairing Tulip No. 3 to make it operational, they led all twelve units and escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その際、マリアが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, Maria said,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっさっきの敵のロボット、倒したんだよね、破片破片、全部もってかえるー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, we defeated the enemy robot from earlier, right? I'll take all the fragments back with me~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （マリアはダークランスの事が少しひっかかっているが、それを考えないようにする為にも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Maria is a little concerned about Dark Lance, but to avoid thinking about it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前向きにメカにむかっていた）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she was positively focusing on the machines.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択肢　ジフテリアへ向かうを選ぶ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Choice: Select ‘Head toward Jiphtheria’.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 船がみたいからそっちに向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I want to see the ship, I head there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアは別行動となる、大丈夫ですよ、魔軍の勢力範囲ですがカスタム自体は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria goes separate; it's okay, although it's within the demon army's territory, the custom machine itself is not...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に占領されている訳じゃないでからと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: occupied by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはジフテリアに向かう、そこにナギが現れる、一緒にいきたい船みたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance heads toward Jiphtheria, where Nagi appears and seems to want to go together to see the ship.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香もしかなく同行する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka reluctantly accompanies them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中のイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Events along the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香とナギ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka and Nagi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ちた遺跡の場所が町になっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The site of fallen ruins has become a town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＹＯＲＡ他、闘神面子を出す？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we include YORA and other Fighting God members?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと前に発掘されたマナバッテリーとかも売っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mana batteries recently excavated were also being sold.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 買ったのはコパンドン、ランス城にこっそり設置している物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ones bought were Copandon, secretly installed in Lance's castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピッテン関係の何かイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some event related to Pitten.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かえるにょメンバー出す？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shall we include the Kaerunyo members?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火星の国の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The story of the country on Mars.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無しでもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it's okay without it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、マリアの様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Maria's situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カスタムに付く、魔軍が居て少し混乱
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She reaches the custom base, finds the demon army there, causing some confusion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな中、ダークランスと出会った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amidst that, she encounters Dark Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内容はカスタムルートと似たような物のダイジェスト版
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The content is a digest version similar to the custom route.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールは出てきません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Paiar does not appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無事にチューリップ３号Ｈ型１２台を引き連れてカスタムを出ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She safely leaves the custom base leading twelve H-type Tulip No. 3 units.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道を移動中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moving along the highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんらかの理由でパイアールと遭遇
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, they encounter Paiar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＰＤ部隊との戦闘になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle with the PD unit ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＰＤはなんとか撃退したが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They somehow repelled the PD,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールはいつの間にかいなくなっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Paiar had disappeared before anyone noticed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジフテリアに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrival at Jiphtheria.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 規模　　★★　／七大自由都市国家の一つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scale: ★★ / One of the Seven Great Free City-States.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市長　ビョンホウ（男、司祭も兼ねている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: City Mayor: Byonhou (male, also serves as priest).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＡＬ教と関係が深い半宗教国家
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A semi-religious state with close ties to the AL religion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが説明してもいいかも、ＡＬ教と関係が深い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukku might explain that it has deep connections with the AL religion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 川中島のカイズとの連絡が密で、カイズに渡る者が必ず通る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They maintain close contact with Kaizu in the Kawanakajima region, and anyone crossing to Kaizu must pass through here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また少しでもＡＬ教聖地の近で済みたい信者が多く住んでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, many believers wishing to live as close as possible to the AL religion's sacred sites reside here.
